scenes.action_text: DONNIE BRASCO by Paul Attanasio Based on the book, "Donnie Brasco," by Joseph D. Pistone with Richard Woodley REVISED DRAFT July 27, 1992 1 EXT. DAY. WASHINGTON, D.C. An AERIAL VIEW of the nation's capital, MOVING IN on the stolid limestone box of FBI HEADQUARTERS. Supered below: FBI HEADQUARTERS. WASHINGTON, D.C. 1981.
